North_Little_Rock.Thurston House (Little Rock, Arkansas): The Thurston House is a historic house at 923 Cumberland Street in Little Rock, Arkansas. It is a 2-1/2 story wood frame structure, with a blend of Colonial Revival and Queen Anne styles. It has a hip roof with gabled dormer and cross gabled sections, and its porch is supported by Tuscan columns, with dentil molding at the cornice, and a spindled balustrade.
